MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L4 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Ruskin Street, Smeaton Street and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:24PM on 14th February 2021.
